description: The neotoma2 R package is a tool to access and manipulate data from the Neotoma Paleoecology Database (https://www.neotomadb.org) within the R environment.
keywords: paleoecology, chronology, stratigraphy, API, Neotoma, fossils, palynology, paleolimnology, archaeology, radiocarbon, 210Pb
title: neotoma2: An R package to access data from the Neotoma Paleoecology Database
